```{r, include=FALSE}
library(MOrepoTools)
dat <- getProblemClasses()
```

# Test instances @ MOrepo

This document gives an overview over all the test instance sets in `MOrepo`. To extract more info about an instance set see [the next section](#extracting-info-about-specific-instances). The current problem classes are `r vec2String(dat)`. The contributions listed after class are:

```{r, results='asis', echo=FALSE, tidy=FALSE}
for (i in dat) {
   cat("\n## Problem class ", i, "\n")
   getInstanceInfo(class = i)
}
```
